ignore_host_description.message: Preventing duplicate tabs whose address contains the `{host}` host

reconsider_host_description.message: Repeated tabs with `{host}` host will NOT be considered duplicates

ignore_url_description.message: Preventing duplicate tabs with the `{url}` address

reconsider_url_description.message: Repeated tabs with `{url}` address will NOT be considered duplicates

close_olders_description.message: Close the old tabs and keep the most recent one with the same URL

keep_active_title.message: Keep the tab that is active

only_http_description.message: 只關閉帶有HTTP網址的標籤

querystring_description.message: If disabled (off) it's ignore querystring in URLs, then this `http://foo/bar?baz` will be equivalent to this `http://foo/bar`

hash_description.message: If disabled (off) it's ignore hash in URLs, then this `http://foo/bar#baz` will be equivalent to this `http://foo/bar`

incognito_description.message: Check repeated anonymous tabs (requires you to manually enable in your browser)

containers_description.message: If enabled it will ignore repeated tabs in different containers, treating them as if they were non-repeated tabs (recommended)

start_event_description.message: Close repeated tabs when your browser is launched

update_event_description.message: Close repeated tabs when a tab is updated

create_event_description.message: Close repeated tabs when a new tab is created

replace_event_description.message: Close repeated tabs when a tab is replaced with another tab due to prerendering or instant

datachange_event_description.message: Close repeated tabs when you change "sort order", "URLs", "others" and "events" configurations from extension
